extension_name.description: The name of the Chrome extension

extension_description.message: A Chrome Extension for POE2 Trade with a sidebar and history management.

log_migration_key.message: Trying to migrate data for key: $1, storage: $2
log_migration_key.description: Log message when migrating data for a key

log_migration_completed.description: Log message when migration is completed

log_zip_created.description: Log message when ZIP file is created

log_search_history_updated.description: Log message when search history is updated

log_toggle_visibility.description: Log message when toggling visibility for an entry

error_clear_history.description: Error message when clearing search history

error_check_favorite.description: Error message when checking favorite status

error_history_list_not_found.description: Error message when history list element is not found

error_extract_panel.description: Error message when extracting current panel

error_handle_url_change.description: Error message when handling URL change

error_trade_preview_not_found.message: Trade preview element not found. Make sure you are on the trade page.
error_trade_preview_not_found.description: Error message when trade preview element is not found

error_wait_for_injector.description: Error message when waiting for TradePreviewInjector

error_invalid_panel_html.description: Error message when panel HTML is invalid

error_insert_preview_panel.message: Failed to insert preview panel next to currentPanel
error_insert_preview_panel.description: Error message when inserting preview panel

error_search_input_not_found.message: Search left input not found. Cannot set search value.
error_search_input_not_found.description: Error message when search input is not found

error_drag_drop.description: Error message during drag and drop

error_migration_description_failed.description: Error message when migration fails with description

error_korean_translation.description: Error message when applying Korean translation

error_build_folder_not_found.description: Error message when build folder is not found

error_content_element_not_found.description: Error message when content element is not found

error_invalid_url_format.message: Invalid current URL format($1), will use history URL instead.
error_invalid_url_format.description: Error message when URL format is invalid

error_trade_preview_panel_not_found.description: Error message when trade preview panel is not found

error_search_button_not_enabled.message: Search button did not become enabled in time
error_search_button_not_enabled.description: Error message when search button is not enabled in time

error_advanced_panel_not_expanded.message: Advanced panel did not expand in time
error_advanced_panel_not_expanded.description: Error message when advanced panel did not expand in time

warn_no_data_for_migration.description: Warning message when no data is found for migration

confirm_clear_history.message: Are you sure you want to clear all search history?
confirm_clear_history.description: Confirmation message for clearing all search history

toast_history_cleared.description: Toast message when history is cleared

toast_history_clear_failed.description: Toast message when history clear fails

toast_history_auto_add.description: Toast message for history auto-add toggle

toast_favorite_add_error.description: Toast message when adding to favorites fails

toast_favorite_add_unknown_error.description: Toast message when adding to favorites fails with unknown error

toast_korean_translation_success.description: Toast message when Korean translation is applied successfully

toast_korean_translation_error.message: Error applying Korean translation. Please try again later.
toast_korean_translation_error.description: Toast message when applying Korean translation fails

toast_folder_name_empty.description: Toast message when folder name is empty

toast_folder_name_too_long.message: Folder name must be 20 characters or less.
toast_folder_name_too_long.description: Toast message when folder name is too long

toast_folder_name_invalid_chars.description: Toast message when folder name contains invalid characters

toast_folder_created.description: Toast message when folder is created

toast_no_folder_selected.message: Please select a folder to delete.
toast_no_folder_selected.description: Toast message when no folder is selected for deletion

toast_cannot_delete_root.description: Toast message when trying to delete the root folder

toast_folder_deleted.description: Toast message when folder is deleted

toast_folder_delete_failed.description: Toast message when folder deletion fails

toast_favorite_added.description: Toast message when item is added to favorites

toast_drag_drop_folder_only.message: You can only drag and drop to folders.
toast_drag_drop_folder_only.description: Toast message when trying to drag and drop to non-folder

toast_item_moved.message: Item "$1" has been moved to folder "$2".
toast_item_moved.description: Toast message when item is moved to a folder

confirm_delete_favorite.message: Are you sure you want to delete the favorite "$1"?
confirm_delete_favorite.description: Confirmation message when deleting a favorite

alert_favorite_renamed.message: The name of "$1" has been changed to "$2".
alert_favorite_renamed.description: Alert message when a favorite has been renamed

error_create_folder.description: Error message when creating a folder

error_delete_folder.description: Error message when deleting a folder

error_add_favorite.description: Error message when adding a favorite

confirm_delete_folder_with_items.message: This folder contains items. Are you sure you want to delete it?
confirm_delete_folder_with_items.description: Confirmation message when deleting a folder with items

alert_favorite_name_invalid.message: Favorite name input is missing or invalid.
alert_favorite_name_invalid.description: Alert message when favorite name input is invalid

alert_favorite_url_undefined.description: Alert message when favorite URL is not defined

prompt_enter_folder_name.description: Prompt message when creating a new folder

button_new_folder.description: Button text for creating a new folder

button_delete_folder.description: Button text for deleting a folder

modal_add_to_favorite_folder.description: Modal title for adding to favorite folder

placeholder_item_name.description: Placeholder text for item name input

history_switch_title.description: Placeholder text for auto-add history switch

korean_translation_error.message: An error occurred while applying Korean translation.

butler_guide_toggle_sidebar.message: Click this button to open or close the sidebar.

butler_guide_switch_tab.message: Click on the "History" or "Favorites" tab to switch between them.

butler_guide_auto_search_slider.message: Enable this to automatically save your searches to history.
butler_guide_auto_search_slider.description: Guide: auto search history toggle slider

butler_guide_history_item.message: Click a search history item to open that trade page again.

butler_guide_favorite_star.message: Click this star to add the current search to your favorites.

butler_guide_preview_icon.message: This icon appears when a preview is available for the item.
butler_guide_preview_icon.description: Guide: preview icon for trade item

butler_guide_remove_history.message: Click this button to remove the search history item.
butler_guide_remove_history.description: Guide: remove search history item button

butler_guide_clear_history_button.message: Click this button to clear all search history.

butler_guide_add_favorite_button.message: Click this button to add the current page to your favorites.
butler_guide_add_favorite_button.description: Guide: add current page to favorites button

butler_guide_favorite_folder_list.message: This is the list of favorite folders.

butler_guide_favorite_folder_icon.message: Click the favorite folder icon (📂) to collapse or expand the folder.
butler_guide_favorite_folder_icon.description: Guide: favorite folder icon for selection or creation

butler_guide_favorite_list_rename_with_d.message: Double-click on the favorite list name to rename it.
butler_guide_favorite_list_rename_with_d.description: Guide: input for favorite folder name

butler_guide_favorite_file_icon_remove_w.message: Click the ⭐ icon to remove an item from your favorites.
butler_guide_favorite_file_icon_remove_w.description: Guide: remove favorite item with trash icon

butler_guide_favorite_file_drag_and_drop.message: You can drag and drop favorite items to move them between folders.
butler_guide_favorite_file_drag_and_drop.description: Guide: drag and drop favorite item to move between folders

butler_guide_start_confirm.message: Click "OK" to begin the guide. You can always return to this guide later at settings.

history_group_today.description: Header for today's search history group

history_group_yesterday.description: Header for yesterday's search history group

history_group_last_week.description: Header for last week's search history group

history_group_older.description: Header for older search history group

already_in_favorites.message:
This item is already in your favorites:
$1
Do you want to add it again?
already_in_favorites.description: Message shown when trying to add an already-favorited item

history_item_last_searched.description: Tooltip: last searched date/time for a history item

history_item_total_searches.description: Tooltip: total search count for a history item

history_item_previous_searches.description: Tooltip: previous search dates for a history item

popup_installed_version.description: Label for installed extension version in popup

popup_latest_version.description: Shown when installed version is up to date

popup_new_version_available.description: Shown when a new version is available (shows latest version)

popup_support_please.message: Please support the electricity bill for playing POE2!

popup_dev_version.description: Shown when installed version is higher than the latest release

alert_import_to_folder.message:
Importing to folder: $1
(Only items in this folder will be affected.)
alert_import_to_folder.description: Alert message when importing to a folder

alert_export_from_folder.message:
Exporting from folder: $1
(Only items in this folder will be exported.)
alert_export_from_folder.description: Alert message when exporting from a folder

alert_select_folder_first.description: Alert message when no folder is selected

popup_check_version_again.description: Button text to check for updates again in the popup

popup_review_this_extension.description: Popup: button text to review the extension

info_backdrop_detected.message: Login page detected. Please log in to open the sidebar.
info_backdrop_detected.description: Info message when backdrop is detected

confirm_redirect_to_other_server.message: This search history is from a different server ($1) than your current server ($2). Do you want to continue?
confirm_redirect_to_other_server.description: Show a confirmation message when the user is trying to move to a trade search history entry from a different game server.

settings_option_select_language_descript.message: Select the language for the extension. The default is to follow the browser settings.
settings_option_select_language_descript.description: Description for the language selection option in settings

settings_option_select_language_default.description: Settings option for selecting default language

settings_changes_applied.description: Message shown when settings changes are successfully applied

settings_no_changes.message: No changes were made to settings.
settings_no_changes.description: Message shown when no changes were made to settings

settings_option_show_guide_again.description: Settings option to show the Butler guide again

settings_option_show_guide_again_enabled.message: Shown Guide Again enabled, Guide will be shown again after refresh.
settings_option_show_guide_again_enabled.description: Settings option to enable showing the Butler guide again

settings_changes_discard_confirm.message: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to discard them and exit settings?
settings_changes_discard_confirm.description: Confirmation message when there are unsaved changes in settings

extension_reloaded_notice.message: Extension was updated. The page will refresh automatically.
extension_reloaded_notice.description: Notice shown when the extension is reloaded

storage_description_unknown_key.message: Unknown storage key. It might have been removed or deprecated.
storage_description_unknown_key.description: Description for unknown keys in storage

storage_description_caches.message: Caches for the extension. This is used to store temporary data for faster access.

storage_description_favoriteFolders.message: Favorite folders for the extension. This is used to store your favorite items.

storage_description_poe2trade_settings_i.message: Cached translation data for the extension.
storage_description_poe2trade_settings_i.description: Stores i18n translation data per language

storage_description_poe2trade_settings_s.description: Indicates whether the sidebar is collapsed

storage_description_poe2trade_storage_ve.description: Tracks current version of the storage schema

storage_description_previewPanelSnapshot.description: Temporary snapshots used in trade preview panel

storage_description_poe2trade_settings_b.description: Which Butler guides have been shown to the user

storage_description_poe2trade_settings_h.description: Whether searches are automatically added to history

storage_description_poe2trade_settings_l.description: Language preference for the extension UI
Which UI tab was last selected by the user

storage_description_poe2trade_settings_r.description: Toggles automatic redirect to POE2 trade page

settings_option_storage_local.description: Settings option to enable local storage for the extension

settings_option_storage_local_descriptio.message:
Use local storage to save your settings and data.
This will persist even after the browser is closed.
settings_option_storage_local_descriptio.description: Description for local storage option in settings

settings_option_storage_sync.description: Settings option to enable Google Account sync for storage

settings_option_storage_sync_description.message:
Use Google Account sync to save your settings and data.
This will sync across all devices where you are logged in with the same account.
settings_option_storage_sync_description.description: Description for Google Account sync storage option in settings

log_migration_skip_remove.message: Skipping migration for key: $1, storage type: $2
log_migration_skip_remove.description: Log message when skipping migration for a key that is already defined or removed

log_migration_remove_old_data.message: Removing old data for migration: storageType: $1, key: $2
log_migration_remove_old_data.description: Log message when removing old data during migration

settings_option_sidebar_opacity_descript.message: Set the opacity of the sidebar. 0% is fully transparent, 100% is fully opaque.
